block.p: World leaders and lay people alike embraced the news of Cardinal John O'Connor's death with mixed emotions -- sadness at the loss of a great leader, tinged with relief after what had been a lengthy decline.

World leaders and lay people alike embraced the news of Cardinal John O'Connor's death with mixed emotions -- sadness at the loss of a great leader, tinged with relief after what had been a lengthy decline.
And as millions mourned their spiritual guide, the speculation over his successor continued. The name of Bishop Edward Michael Egan of Bridgeport, Conn., was at the top of a list of candidates.
